text: Edvard Johannes Brost Forssell (25 September 1946 - 4 January 2018) was a Swedish actor and comedian. He was born in Stockholm, Sweden. He was known for his role as Joker the bartender in the TV soap opera Rederiet. Brost has also starred as a villain in two Jönssonligan movies. Brost died from complications of pancreatic cancer on 4 January 2018 in Lund at the age of 71.Johannes Brost är död ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Sweden Category:Swedish movie actors Category:Swedish television actors Category:Swedish voice actors Category:Swedish comedians Category:Actors from Stockholm
